  rating: [5, 4.5, 4.0, 5, 5], 

  dolar: [ '$1m', '$2m','$0.1m', '$2.5m','$3m'] 

}

table(df)

Passing columns and data to DataFrame

cell-34.in:
data = [ 

  ['Drake', 5, '$1m'], 

  ['Rihanna', 4.5, '$2m'], 

  ['Gambino', 4.0, '$0.1m'], 

  ['Bellion', 5, '$2.5m'], 

  ['Passenger', 5, '$3m'] 

] 

columns = ['artist', 'rating', 'dollar'] 

df = new dfd. DataFrame (data, {columns: columns}) 
table(df)

Logical Operations

cell-81.in:
data = {"Col1": [10, 45, 56, 10], 

        "Col2": [23, 20, 10, 24]} 

df = new dfd. DataFrame (data) 

df_rep = df.lt(20) 

table(df_rep)
cell-81.out:
Col1Col2
0truefalse
1falsefalse
2falsetrue
3truefalse

cell-82.in:
series = new dfd.Series([45,10]) 

df_rep = df.lt(series, axis=1) 

table(df_rep)
cell-82.out:
Col1Col2
0truefalse
1falsefalse
2falsefalse
3truefalse

         "Col2": [23, 20, 10, 24]} 

data2 = {"new_col1": [10, 45, 200, 10], 

         "new_Col2": [230, 200, 110, 24]} 

 
df = new dfd. DataFrame (data) 

df2 = new dfd. DataFrame (data2) 

df_rep = df.lt(df2) 

table(df_rep)
